title: Cruciform Mark. The strange story of Richard Tregenna, etc
author: Stephens, Riccardo.
snippet: grass by the fence before getting over, and then, circling round Blackford Hill, with many turns and windings, and often listening for the sound of footsteps behind me, I at last broke into a steady jog trot, which I kept up for a mile, and getting into the city again by way of the Dalkeith Road and the old High Street, heard a cock faintly crow in some far-off stable-yard before I got back. It was raining when I went out, it was raining when I came in, and my clothes were soaked through and through.
